the Los Angeles Lakers on Tuesday night. Allen Iverson helped pull the Sixers( 31-33) to four games of Boston for first place in the Atlantic Division. "It made me feel good," Allen Iverson said. Any win makes me feel good. Allen Iverson , though, chipped a bone in his left thumb sometime in the second half and will be fitted for a cast. He is day-to-day.
